song.title: Draw me Close to You
song.lyrics:
[1] .G C Draw me close to You .D G Never let me go .D C I lay it all down again .Em C To hear you say that I'm Your friend
[2] .G C/G You are my desire .D/G G No one else will do .D/F# C/E Em Cause nothing else could take Your place . Em/D C D/F# To feel the warmth of Your embrace || .G/D C/D D G C/D D Help me find the way, bring me back to You
[C] .G D C You're all I want .G D C D You're all I ever needed || .G D C You're all I want .Em D G Help me know You are near
